0.french: Je vais à l'école tous les jours.
0.english: I go to school every day.

1.french: Le chat dort sur le canapé.
1.english: The cat sleeps on the couch.

3.english: It is raining a lot today.

4.french: Nous allons au parc cet après-midi.
4.english: We are going to the park this afternoon.

5.french: Je préfère les chiens aux chats.

6.french: Le soleil brille dans le ciel.
6.english: The sun is shining in the sky.

8.french: Ils jouent au football après l'école.
8.italian: Giocano a calcio dopo la scuola.

9.french: Nous avons visité un musée ce matin.
9.english: We visited a museum this morning.
9.italian: Abbiamo visitato un museo questa mattina.

10.french: Je bois du café chaque matin.

11.french: Il a acheté une nouvelle voiture hier.
11.english: He bought a new car yesterday.
11.italian: Ha comprato una nuova macchina ieri.

12.french: Elle a cuisiné un délicieux repas.

13.french: Nous regardons un film ce soir.
13.english: We are watching a movie tonight.

14.english: I am working from home today.

15.french: Ils étudient pour l'examen de demain.
15.english: They are studying for tomorrow's exam.
15.italian: Stanno studiando per l'esame di domani.

16.french: Le train part dans dix minutes.
16.english: The train leaves in ten minutes.
16.italian: Il treno parte tra dieci minuti.

17.french: Nous avons passé un bon moment hier soir.
17.english: We had a great time last night.
17.italian: Abbiamo passato una bella serata ieri sera.

18.french: Elle a trouvé un travail dans une grande entreprise.
18.english: She found a job at a big company.
18.italian: Ha trovato un lavoro in una grande azienda.

19.french: Je joue du piano depuis cinq ans.
19.english: I have been playing the piano for five years.
19.italian: Suono il pianoforte da cinque anni.
